pr_title: Support partitioned topics in the Reader

timeline.bodyText: Why need a set for storing ignored consumers here? I noticed if a consumer is added to this set, the message will be acked and users will miss messages of this consumer. Is it an expected behavior?
timeline.author: codelipenghui

timeline.bodyText: If the internal topics of the multiple topics consumer  with the same partition index but different topic name, it will introduce some problems here?
timeline.author: codelipenghui

timeline.bodyText: I think here also assume that all topics of the multiple topics consumer are under a partitioned topic?
timeline.author: codelipenghui

timeline.message: remove the ability to seek msgId
